tuv.seg: Introduction to the euro area
Réamhrá le limistéar an euro
The euro area consists of those EU countries which have adopted the euro as their currency
Is éard atá i limistéar an euro tíortha siúd an AE a ghlac leis an euro mar a n-airgeadra
The euro is the unit of currency of 18 EU Member States. Background on its introduction
Pléann an cháipéis seo an euro - airgead na 18 ballstáit AE
This document is in: Money and Tax > Personal finance > Financial institutions
This document is in: Airgead agus Cáin > Airgeadas pearsanta > Faoiseamh cánach ar tháillí don tríú leibhéal
Find out about the advanced security features which make euro banknotes and coins recognisable and protect against counterfeiting
Déantar cur síos sa doiciméad seo ar shonraí slándála na nótaí agus boinn nua Euro
This document is in: Money and Tax > Personal finance > Financial institutions
This document is in: Airgead agus Cáin > Airgeadas pearsanta > Faoiseamh cánach ar tháillí don tríú leibhéal
The collection of EU rules on government debt and deficits is called the Stability and Growth Pact
Tugtar an Comhaontú Cobhsaíochta agus Fáis ar an mbailiúchán de rialacha an AE ar fhiachas agus ar easnaimh rialtais
There are mechanisms set up for providing funding to member states that are experiencing economic difficulties
Tá meicníochtaí socraithe chun cistiú a sholáthar do bhallstáit atá thíos le deacrachtaí geilleagracha
The Fiscal Stability Treaty aims to strengthen fiscal discipline in the euro area
Tá sé de chuspóir ag an gConradh um Chobhsaíocht Fhioscach disciplín fhioscach a threisiú i limistéar an euro
A banking union was set up to ensure that banks are stronger and better supervised and problems resolved more easily
Bunaíodh aontas baincéireachta lena chinntiú go mbíonn bainc níos treise agus go ndéantar maoirseacht níos fearr orthu agus go réitítear fadhbanna níos fusa
There is an EU-wide system for the supervision of the financial sector
Tá córas ar fud an AE ann chun maoirseacht a dhéanamh ar an earnáil airgeadais
Most Read in "Government in Ireland"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Rialtas in Éirinn"
Fundamental Rights under the Irish Constitution
Bunchearta faoi Bhunreacht na hÉireann
